pages.text: The Artifacts mod adds many items that provide special effects and abilities. For example, Night Vision Goggles give night vision, and the Cloud in a Bottle gives a double jump boost.$(br2)Note: The Everlasting Beef artifact won't drop from cows. Please don't go on a killing spree. And if you do happen to find one, the cooldown is 5 minutes.

Find artifacts around the world in loot chests. And there's a chance that you can get them through archaeology digs!$(br2)And of course there's the mimic, who always drops an artifact. Watch out, they are mean.
